# Questions

```{r library}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(EQRIanalysis)
library(htmltools)
```

```{r get-data}
#| echo: false
#| message: false

questions_df <- EQRIanalysis::get_questions_df()
responses_df <- EQRIanalysis::get_responses_df()
```

```{r}
# Render all questions using lapply and generate a tagList
tagList(
  lapply(questions_df$QUESTION_NUMBER, function(idx) {
    render_question(questions_df, responses_df, idx)
  })
)
```
